languages.text: "Характер показываешь?" {n}Торбальд взрыкивает и упирает в вас гневный взор.{/n} "Хорошо, уважу тебя, военачальни{mf|к|ца}. А только жжет мои уста горький вкус подозрений". {n}Волк с заметным презрением отстраняется от Айшары.{/n}

"What's this? A show of character?" {n}Thorbald growls and locks his indignant gaze with yours.{/n} "Fine, I will respect your wishes, warlord. But the bitter taste of suspicion burns my mouth." {n}With pointed contempt, he steps away from Aishara.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Характер показываешь?" {n}Торбальд взрыкивает и упирает в вас гневный взор.{/n} "Хорошо, уважу тебя, военачальни{mf|к|ца}. А только жжет мои уста горький вкус подозрений". {n}Волк с заметным презрением отстраняется от Айшары.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "What's this? A show of character?" {n}Thorbald growls and locks his indignant gaze with yours.{/n} "Fine, I will respect your wishes, warlord. But the bitter taste of suspicion burns my mouth." {n}With pointed contempt, he steps away from Aishara.{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "What's this? A show of character?" {n}Thorbald growls and locks his indignant gaze with yours.{/n} "Fine, I will respect your wishes, warlord. But the bitter taste of suspicion burns my mouth." {n}With pointed contempt, he steps away from Aishara.{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “这算怎么回事？打算来个下马威吗？”{n}索巴德怒吼着，愤怒的目光直视着你。{/n}“很好，我愿意尊重你的意愿，战争领主，但苦涩的怀疑在我口中灼烧。”{n}他目光中充满了尖锐的蔑视，从艾莎拉身边走过。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What's this? A show of character?" {n}Thorbald growls and locks his indignant gaze with yours.{/n} "Fine, I will respect your wishes, warlord. But the bitter taste of suspicion burns my mouth." {n}With pointed contempt, he steps away from Aishara.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这算怎么回事？打算来个下马威吗？”{n}索巴德怒吼着，愤怒的目光直视着你。{/n}“很好，我愿意尊重你的意愿，战争领主，但苦涩的怀疑在我口中灼烧。”{n}他目光中充满了尖锐的蔑视，从艾莎拉身边走过。{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Tiens donc, une démonstration d'autorité ? » {n}Thorbald grogne et plonge son regard indigné dans le vôtre.{/n} « Très bien, je vais me plier à vos règles, {mf|seigneur|seigneure} de guerre, mais ça ne m'empêchera pas de rester méfiant. » {n}Avec un mépris appuyé, il s'éloigne d'Aishara.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What's this? A show of character?" {n}Thorbald growls and locks his indignant gaze with yours.{/n} "Fine, I will respect your wishes, warlord. But the bitter taste of suspicion burns my mouth." {n}With pointed contempt, he steps away from Aishara.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Tiens donc, une démonstration d'autorité ? » {n}Thorbald grogne et plonge son regard indigné dans le vôtre.{/n} « Très bien, je vais me plier à vos règles, {mf|seigneur|seigneure} de guerre, mais ça ne m'empêchera pas de rester méfiant. » {n}Avec un mépris appuyé, il s'éloigne d'Aishara.{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「なんだ？急に本性を出したか？」{n}トールバルドは唸り、憤慨した視線をこちらに向けた。{/n}「わかった。言うことを聞こう、ウォーロード。だがまだお前を信頼したわけじゃないからな」{n}彼は軽蔑する様子でアイシャラから離れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "What's this? A show of character?" {n}Thorbald growls and locks his indignant gaze with yours.{/n} "Fine, I will respect your wishes, warlord. But the bitter taste of suspicion burns my mouth." {n}With pointed contempt, he steps away from Aishara.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なんだ？急に本性を出したか？」{n}トールバルドは唸り、憤慨した視線をこちらに向けた。{/n}「わかった。言うことを聞こう、ウォーロード。だがまだお前を信頼したわけじゃないからな」{n}彼は軽蔑する様子でアイシャラから離れた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «¿A qué viene tanta fanfarronería?». {n}Thorbald gruñe y fija su indignada mirada en la tuya.{/n} «De acuerdo. Respetaré su decisión, {mf|señor|señora} adalid, pero que sepa que percibo el acre sabor de la sospecha». {n}Con un desprecio más que evidente, se aleja de Aishara.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What's this? A show of character?" {n}Thorbald growls and locks his indignant gaze with yours.{/n} "Fine, I will respect your wishes, warlord. But the bitter taste of suspicion burns my mouth." {n}With pointed contempt, he steps away from Aishara.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿A qué viene tanta fanfarronería?». {n}Thorbald gruñe y fija su indignada mirada en la tuya.{/n} «De acuerdo. Respetaré su decisión, {mf|señor|señora} adalid, pero que sepa que percibo el acre sabor de la sospecha». {n}Con un desprecio más que evidente, se aleja de Aishara.{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Was wird das? Wollt Ihr Charakter beweisen?" {n}Thorbald knurrt und starrt dich entrüstet an.{/n} "Schön, ich respektiere Eure Wünsche, Kriegsherr. Doch der bittere Geschmack des Misstrauens brennt in meinem Mund." {n}Mit deutlicher Verachtung tritt er von Aishara weg.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What's this? A show of character?" {n}Thorbald growls and locks his indignant gaze with yours.{/n} "Fine, I will respect your wishes, warlord. But the bitter taste of suspicion burns my mouth." {n}With pointed contempt, he steps away from Aishara.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Was wird das? Wollt Ihr Charakter beweisen?" {n}Thorbald knurrt und starrt dich entrüstet an.{/n} "Schön, ich respektiere Eure Wünsche, Kriegsherr. Doch der bittere Geschmack des Misstrauens brennt in meinem Mund." {n}Mit deutlicher Verachtung tritt er von Aishara weg.{/n}
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Bu ne? Güç gösterisi mi?" {n}Hırlayan Thorbald, dargın bakışlarını senin gözlerine kenetliyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. İsteklerine saygı göstereceğim savaş beyi. Ancak şüphe tohumunun acımsı tadı dilimi burkuyor, bunu da bilesin." {n}İmalı teessüfü eşliğinde Aishara'dan uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "What's this? A show of character?" {n}Thorbald growls and locks his indignant gaze with yours.{/n} "Fine, I will respect your wishes, warlord. But the bitter taste of suspicion burns my mouth." {n}With pointed contempt, he steps away from Aishara.{/n}
